import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import TaskModel from 'src/app/models/task-model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-single-task', templateUrl: './single-task.component.html', styleUrls: ['./single-task.component.css'], }) export class SingleTaskComponent { constructor(){} @Input() task: TaskModel | undefined; }

{{ task?.description }}

{{ task?.created | date }}
{{ task?.customer_id }}
{{ task?.isDone ? "accomplished" : "not done" }}
